title: Sale
name: sale
description: A sale initiates a payment operation to the card reader. In it's simplest form you only have to pass the amount and currency but it also accepts a device object and a map with extra parameters.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.notes: Amount of funds to charge - in the minor unit of currency (f.ex. 1000 is 10.00 GBP)

parameters.name: device
parameters.notes: This is used if you want to send the operation to a specific device. Recommended if you are using multiple devices

elements.name: currentTransactionStatus
elements.description: Invoked while during transaction with different statuses from card reader

elements.name: signatureRequired
elements.description: Invoked if card verification requires signature.

elements.name: endOfTransaction
elements.description: Invoked when the card reader finishes processing the transaction

elements.name: Boolean
elements.description: true if the operation was successfully sent to device

example:
//Initiate a sale for 10.00 in Great British Pounds
api.sale(new BigInteger("1000"),Currency.GBP);
